detectors.description:
StateOfTheArt._generateHash(uint256[],string,address) (StateOfTheArt.sol#292-302) calls keccak256(abi.encodePacked()) with multiple dynamic arguments. It could result in hash collisions:keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(Ethereum Signed Message:
,msgLengthBytes.toString(),tokens,keccak256(bytes)(bytes(uri)),sender)) (StateOfTheArt.sol#294-301)

detectors.description: StateOfTheArt._getRandomIndex(uint256) (StateOfTheArt.sol#248-251) uses a weak PRNG: random % maxIndex (StateOfTheArt.sol#250)

StateOfTheArt._getRandomIndex(uint256) (StateOfTheArt.sol#248-251) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: random = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.coinbase,block.difficulty,msg.sender,_counter))) (StateOfTheArt.sol#249)
